parameters.name: CertIds
parameters.description: The ID of the certificate. Separate multiple certificate IDs with commas (,). You can call the [ListUserCertificateOrder](~~455804~~) operation to obtain the ID of a certificate from the **CertificateId** parameter.

parameters.name: ContactIds
parameters.description: The ID of the contact. Separate multiple contact IDs with commas (,). You can call the [ListContact](~~2712221~~) operation to obtain the ID of a contact from the **ContactId** parameter.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment task. You can call the [CreateDeploymentJob](~~2712234~~) operation to obtain the ID of a deployment task from the JobId parameter. You can also call the [ListDeploymentJob](~~2712223~~) operation to obtain the ID of a deployment task.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the deployment task.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the cloud resource. Separate multiple resource IDs with commas (,). You can call the [ListCloudResources](~~2712230~~) operation to obtain the ID of a cloud resource from the **Id** parameter.

parameters.name: ScheduleTime
parameters.description: The time when the task starts. The value is a UNIX timestamp. If you do not specify this parameter, the system immediately starts the task after it is created.
